text: Gah. I've been trying to find more design specs about the Tesla "open source" patents. Only information I can find freely is the patents themselves, no design specs or technical details. Their definition of Open Source is really much different than the industry standard. <https://www.tesla.com/about/legal#patent-list>

attachments.title: Privacy & Legal | Tesla
attachments.text: Tesla Motors privacy policy, patent list, terms of use, human rights policy, and information security policy.
